name: Six°
description:
Who was it that starred in that one movie with that other guy? Download this fun game of strategy and expertise to discover how well you really know Hollywood. It puts a modern twist on the old “Six Degrees of Kevin Bacon” parlor game and challenges you to link Kevin Bacon to other actors and actresses through a sequence of filmographies (powered by TMDb). Each step from one person to another is considered a degree of separation. Link them in 6 steps or less to win!

Want a greater challenge? Upgrade to unlock the ability to choose your starting and ending celebrities, opening up a world of possibility beyond Kevin Bacon.
